attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to the public and only approve organised displays
attributes.additional_details:
People are misusing fire work 
Damage people property 
Setting them off in back Street 
Upsetting life stock 
Firework baned should be took to parliament as it not all fun an
attributes.background: People now day don't have any  respect for people property or life stock example they let off fire work in back Street and most of these are young people wich should have them and the police don't care it time something is sorted out not tossed to the side.
